steps.1: Mix all the cottage cheese with eggs, sugar and mix everything thoroughly
steps.2: Pour the flour into the cottage cheese and mix thoroughly
steps.3: Put the frying pan on medium heat and pour sunflower oil into it
steps.4: Make a few small balls of the resulting curd mass and put them on a plate. Then, in turn, roll the curd balls in flour and put them in a frying pan
steps.5: Fry the cheesecakes for 1-2 minutes until golden brown. Then turn them over to the other side and also fry until golden brown
steps.6: Repeat until the cottage cheese is finished

name: Red Bean Salad with Cream Cheese, Red Onion and Seasonal Lettuce

steps.1: Open two cans of red beans in their own juice, drain the juice and rinse the beans with cold water
steps.2: Mix the finished beans with finely chopped red onion, herbs, crushed garlic, olive oil, lemon juice and curd cheese
steps.3: Salt, pepper, let the products rub against each other for two minutes and serve

steps.1: Pour a liter of water into a small saucepan and add the washed lentils. Put the saucepan on medium heat
steps.2: Grate a small carrot on a coarse grater, finely chop the onion. As soon as the lentils begin to boil, you need to reduce the heat, and then add another 200 ml of water or broth. Cook for another ten minutes
steps.3: Heat a wide flat frying pan, add sunflower and butter there. Fry onions and carrots
steps.4: Add the fried vegetables to the pan, pour in the cream. Blend the soup with a hand blender until it becomes a thick puree. Soup can be served

steps.1: Cut the vegetables coarsely, tear the salad into pieces
steps.2: Bring heavily salted water to a boil and add the shrimp. After boiling, cook for 5 minutes
steps.3: Clean the shrimp from the shell
steps.5: Sprinkle with sesame seeds and season with mayonnaise

name: Cottage cheese donuts in powdered sugar

ingredients.name: Powdered sugar with vanilla to taste

steps.1: In a bowl, mix cottage cheese, eggs, flour, sugar, soda and salt until smooth
steps.2: Heat the olive oil well in a small saucepan
steps.3: Using a teaspoon or your hands, roll the dough into balls, each slightly smaller than a walnut
steps.4: Throw donuts into boiling oil and fry over low heat, constantly turning over with a slotted spoon
steps.5: Put the finished donuts on a paper towel and leave for one to two minutes - so that it absorbs excess oil
